Board.title: Control the hose-pipe
Board.description: Tux needs to water the flowers, but the hose is blocked.
Board.manual: Move the mouse over the red part of the hose-pipe. This will move it, bringing it, part by part, up to the flowers. Be careful, if you move off the hose, the red part will go back down.
